page.title: 12SPORTING ACTIVITIES
page.content: {SPORTING ACTIVITIES DUNSMORE {Ellesborough Golf Club}is an 18 hole course, 9 holes of which run along the lower slopes of Coombe Hill. The club has a total membership of 725. {Wendover Rifle Club}meets in the County Rifle Range situated in the old gravel pits off the A413 just out of Wendover. The membership of 26 is allowed to use the County Association facilities.{Russell Farm}is an equestrian centre and is the venue of 5 Pony Club Camps yearly. Participants come from neighbouring counties to the week_long camps. 3 sponsored cross country events are held each year as well as instructional courses. The farm has a blacksmith's shop {Dunsmore Stable}offer riding in_ struction, horses for hacking and also livery accommodation. An indoor riding school is attached to the stables.
